events.name: Next '18 Extended Maiduguri

venue.name: Yaysib Computers
venue.address_1: Opposite General Hospital, Post Office Maidugur

events.description:
Imagine:
Let’s power the cloud forward together. Connect with big thinkers and even bigger doers at Next ’18 to create a cloud that can help us all in new, impactful ways.

Learn:
Engage with the best minds in cloud technology on how your industry is adapting, innovating, and growing with cloud. Hear case studies and stories from customers who are using Google Cloud technology to disrupt the status quo and build their futures.

Build:
Dive deep into everything from accessible machine learning to advancements in security. Hone your skills on the latest cloud technologies with Google experts at hundreds of breakout sessions and interactive, on-demand hands-on labs and bootcamps.

events.name: DevFest 2018 Maiduguri "Build for Digital Wellbeing"
events.description:
Details

GDG DevFest 2018 is our annual developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

This year's theme is: Building for Digital Wellbeing.

This is a gathering of developers from Maiduguri and Google technology enthusiasts which will cover multiple product areas such as Android, Firebase, Android Things, Flutter, Google Cloud Platform, Google Assistant, IoT, Machine Learning, Mobile Web and Artificial intelligence.

This event will feature speaker sessions, codelabs and a full day [day 2] hackathon.

P.S: There will be lots of freebies and swags for everyone! RSVP now, and ensure you give us your email address and phone number.

events.name: Flutter Study Jam

venue.name: Banquet Hall
venue.address_1: Banquet Hall - Former Wonderland  Opposite Bukar Bolori House

events.description:
Come and Learn Flutter for hybrid mobile apps development. Develop your Android and iOS app from one codebase. Fun. Isn't it? Sign Up for our Flutter Study Jam and develop the right skills you based on Udacity's Flutter Course.

Bring a laptop! The course will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers.

Requirements
The laptop should have Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam to save time. Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine. Check out: https://flutter.io/get-started/install/
Remember the event is free

events.name: Cloud Study Jam
events.description:
Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform, how to run containers on it and how to use the platform for data engineering. Attendees get free access to the labs ($70+ value).

At the end of the event, every attendee will be getting Google-hosted badges that they can add to enhance their online portfolios or to simply show-off their cloud skill to employers.

Please make sure to bring your laptops and chargers since this will be a totally hands-on event.
